data.name: Robolife2 - Nova Duty
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1703220


About the Game




This is a game about visual novel with time management.
You will order your robot girl to work and upgrade her components to work harder.


In addition to the gameplay of the Days with Aino, we have added elements of exploration and combat this time in Duty with Nova
Also full voiced for H-events, we will make H-animations as well.
We have brand new jobs for Nova to do.
Also new topic of components to upgrades and modify the costumes too!
The changes and upgrades you make to Nova will appear throughout the game.
Which means you can make-your-own-Nova like before!


A thrilling and titillating story with CGs and 8000+ lines of dialogue and multiple endings.
Plenty of naughty & amusing H-events and H-CGs and H-animations !
Additional adorable mini-CGs and ALL the cute robo-girl hijinks.

data.short_description: 2nd series from Robolife-Days with Aino Live with a robot girl from nowhere. Fix her body and find her secret. Visual Novel with Date sim & time management gameplay!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

All character depicted are over the age of 18.
This game contains mildly nudity content and sexually suggestive content, General Mature Content. please be aware.
